input.sentences: for fourth of july the family met at the park .
my lover and i snuck away to watch the sun go down against the ocean .
when we returned the boys were starting to grill .
the food of course was amazing .
it is so good to join up and talk about the good ol days .
output.sentences: It was July when they met in the park.
They watched the sun as it snuck through the clouds and over the horizon.
As the evening was starting, they returned to the grill.
The food they cooked was amazing.
They talked and all joined hands.
